pages.title: SAFETY BULLETIN #41
pages.text: $(bold)ORSA ORBITAL SAFETY DIVISION$()$(br)$(bold)RE: STOP TOUCHING THE CRYSTALS$()$(br2)Orbital thermal imaging has detected you handling raw Acheronite Shards without proper protection. The shards are $(bold)-189°C$(). This is not a suggestion. This is thermodynamics.$(br2)$(italic)We can see your body temperature dropping from orbit. Please stop. — ORSA Monitoring$()

pages.title: Frostbite Stages
pages.text: $(bold)Holding in hand:$()$(br)$(li)$(bold)Stage 1:$() Numbness, Slowness I. "My fingers feel funny."$(li)$(bold)Stage 2:$() Spreading cold, Slowness II. "I can't feel my arms."$(li)$(bold)Stage 3:$() Tissue damage, Slowness II + direct damage. "I can't feel anything."$(li)After 30 seconds: Mining Fatigue II. Good luck mining with frozen hands.$(br2)$(bold)In inventory:$() Same stages, but 3x slower. The cold seeps through your pack. Insulation only delays the inevitable.

pages.title: Protection
pages.text: $(bold)Grace periods by armor:$()$(br)$(li)No armor: 10 seconds. Orbital command is shaking their heads.$(li)Tier 1 (Insulated): 25 seconds.$(li)Tier 2 (Heated): 45 seconds.$(li)Tier 3 (EVA): 90 seconds.$(li)Acheronite or Lined EVA: $(bold)Immune.$() Fight ice with ice.$(br2)$(bold)Recovery:$() Put the shard down. The cold fades slowly. Emphasis on $(italic)slowly$().$(br2)$(italic)ORSA Medical (Orbital) reminds you: You are the only person on the planet. There is no one to help you if you lose your fingers. Act accordingly.$()
